name: Toccata And Fugue
description:
Being a one-woman band touring around the world in a big red van is an awesome way of living while sharing your music with everybody, so, what could be wrong? Well, everything goes wrong when the van opens accidentally its doors and you loose all of your instruments in JAPAN!

 Help our friend to bring them back in time and save tonight's show with this musical/platform game. Pay attention, some instruments can be a bit tricky to get!

This game was made under 48h for the Global Jam 2021 with the team:

Clara Case - Artist (intagram)

Adrian Cortes - Composer and sound designer

Marc Galdo - Programmer

Marina Chavarria - Programer, artist and designer

Claudia Martos - Technical artist and designer
